titles.title: To designate the United States Courthouse located at 40 Centre Street in New York, New York, as the "Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/9/1998--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Courthouse located at 40 Centre Street in New York, New York, as the Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse.
